snippet.title: Perfect Match: Netflix Stories | Official Game Trailer | Netflix
snippet.description:
Create your dream character, date anyone who catches your eye, and find love — or break hearts — in this game based on the hit Netflix reality show.

Play Perfect Match: Netflix Stories on your mobile devices. Available exclusively on Netflix: https://www.netflix.com/game/81774701

About Netflix:
Netflix is one of the world's leading entertainment services, with 270 million paid memberships in over 190 countries enjoying TV series, films and games across a wide variety of genres and languages. Members can play, pause and resume watching as much as they want, anytime, anywhere, and can change their plans at any time.

Perfect Match: Netflix Stories | Official Game Trailer | Netflix
https://www.youtube.com/@Netflix

You're the main character in this collection of interactive story games based on Netflix’s hit shows and films. Romance or drama — which will you choose?
